flavorText:
"Perhaps you believe, even in these final moments, that you will be saved. But doom has no snooze button, you fools!"
—Baron Von Count
name: Clock of DOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
originalText: {4}, {T}: Move the CRANK counter to your Contraption deck's next sprocket and crank any number of that sprocket's Contraptions.

rulings.text: If the CRANK! counter is on Sprocket 1, it moves to Sprocket 2. Sprocket 2 to sprocket 3, and Sprocket 3 to Sprocket 1, as normal.
To crank a Contraption causes its ability to trigger and go on the stack, similar to what happens at the beginning of your turn normally.

text: {4}, {T}: Move the CRANK! counter to your Contraption deck's next sprocket and crank any number of that sprocket's Contraptions.
